name: GraphConnect
description:
Made for Extra Credits Game Jam #4. I did not have much time and I'm still learning the tools, so it is rather minimalist. Just use your mouse to turn disconnected graphs into connected ones. Tutorial available.

I'd like to have included some music, but I won't get to that before the deadline. Sorry folks!

This game was made with Godot and there were some third party assets used. Please see the license files included in the downloadable archive for any details.
